headline: Wabtec’s Q4 Earnings Call: Our Top 5 Analyst Questions
summary: Westinghouse Air Brake Technologies’ fourth quarter results were well received by the market, reflecting solid execution across core businesses and strong demand in both freight and transit segments. Management noted that order conversion and robust backlog growth were central to the quarter’s momentum, with CEO Rafael Ottoni Santana emphasizing a 23% increase in the multiyear backlog. The company also pointed to operational efficiencies, with CFO John A. Olin highlighting improved gross margins
